title: Why do people get a flash of anger when i tell them i muted them?
body: seems like these kids throw my game when i say that i muted them so i cant hear them at all or see their pings.  I thought muting them is the option to go to but they try even harder to get my attention.  do you mute them or not? {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: Why would you tell them youre muting? Why not just mute? Try to take all ego out of it and just mute. You dont need to announce that youre ignoring someone, unless youre trying to send a message. So maybe they just feel offended by that message youre sending. Just mute, dont announce it. I know when I mute someone, I like to tell them theyre muted just to let em know I'm above them.  Luckily, its pretty rare that I feel the need to mute someone, and even more rare for them to troll because of it.

Lol 
People who publicly announce they muted someone are no better than your typical toxic asshats.
how? im letting them know i cant hear them so dont bother trying to type or ping to me, thats courtesy.

Typically, it comes off as extremely dismissive.  

You can word it nicely like "I'm gonna mute and focus" and it won't sound as dismissive.  When you worded nicely, it's also not targetting anyone in particular (none of that "lux I'mmuting you").
thanks for the actual input, i think ill use that line and see if it works. something like "lux, im muting you to focus on the game"?

Basically you have to treat every single player as a childish man-baby who is starved for attention and thinks the world revolves around them. When they find out they are denied that attention, they'll get angry since you aren't revolving around them "any longer".

Just mute and report, you don't have to mention it. And if they troll because you're ignoring them, report them for that too.

I have been doing that under griefing, intentionally feeding, and verbal abuse. since they are doing all 3.  its a hit or miss with if actionw as taken but I do get about 2 taken actions per  2 weeks.

Muting them is the option.

Telling them you're muting them is fanning the flames. You don't need to tell some jackwad that you muted them. When you use chat in League, stop briefly and think to yourself, "Will saying this get **me** closer to a win?" Telling someone you muted them will only get you further from a win.
